name: CreateDatadogRestrictionQuery
description:
Create a new restriction query in Datadog.

This tool creates a restriction query for your organization in Datadog. Use it to manage log access and configurations.

parameters.name: restriction_query
parameters.description: A string representing the restriction query to manage log access and configurations.

parameters.name: restriction_query_resource_type
parameters.description: Specifies the type of restriction query resource. Must be 'logs_restriction_queries'.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.
